publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3854.1 Mr John Swinney: Budget (Scotland) No.3 Billâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-3854) in the name of Mr Tom McCabe, insert at end "but, in so doing, calls on the Scottish Executive to reconsider the 2006-07 financial settlement for local authorities, with the objectives of addressing the funding shortfall identified by the Finance Committee and delivering a real-terms freeze for council tax payers." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
